SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.research

Entry Element ResearchSubject

Documentation:
Record of a subject's enrollment and participation in a research study.
Ancestors:
  • Any
    • Content
      • Party
        • Role
          • ResearchSubject

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      Value
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(Patient)
      1..1
      Study
      A clinical trial or similar research study. Reference: list of FDA data elements describing a research study: prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/definitions.html
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(Study)
      1..1
      Status
      Position in workflow.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Status
      1..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-subject-status (REQUIRED)
      ParticipationPeriod
      The point in time or span of time the participant is involved.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ParticipationPeriod
      1..1
      TerminationReason
      A description and/or code explaining the premature termination of the study.

      0..1
